original_title: Gejaagd door de winst (of het A.B.C. van de moderne samenleving)
overview: A three independent parts sci-fi drama. In the first, entitled The Bomb, a story of a garage mechanic is told who finds an atomic bomb by accident. The second part, entitled The Last Judgment, deals with the consequences of a military convoy carrying biological weapons going mad. In the third part, entitled Experts Of Evil, there is an accident at a chemical plant when a,pressurized container with dioxin explodes resulting in leakage.
title: Gejaagd door de winst (of het A.B.C. van de moderne samenleving)
